plays.text: Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom AND Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Niklas Kronwall 2 minutes for Hooking Ryan Getzlaf
Penalty to Andy McDonald 2 minutes for Hooking Kris Draper
Penalty to Robert Lang 2 minutes for Hooking Jonathan Hedstrom
Penalty to Sean O'Donnell 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Todd Marchant 2 minutes for Hooking Henrik Zetterberg
Goal scored by Mathieu Schneider assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom AND Robert Lang
Penalty to Johan Franzen 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Jean-Sebastien Giguere
Goal scored by Teemu Selanne assisted by Scott Niedermayer AND Andy McDonald
Penalty to Tomas Holmstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Jeff Friesen
Penalty to Scott Niedermayer 2 minutes for Interference Daniel Cleary
Penalty to Henrik Zetterberg 2 minutes for Hooking Jonathan Hedstrom
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Chris Kunitz 2 minutes for Tripping Chris Chelios
Goal scored by Kris Draper assisted by Brendan Shanahan AND Nicklas Lidstrom
